summary:
Adds adoring fan.
You can find him in candlehearth hall, windhelm.
He is a follower.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://skyrimshot.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-57.html]日本語の説明[/url]
My blog [url=https://skyrimshot.blogspot.jp/2017/09/adoringfan.html]article[/url]


Adds adoring fan.
You can find him in candlehearth hall, Windhelm.
He is a follower. He respawns in Windhelm when he dies.

We don't know why he is alive. Sheogorath's prank or a descendant?

He uses separate textures and meshes.
You don't need any additional mods for his appearances.

Face Textures: Pretty Face for Men
Meshes: Vanilla
Eyes: Original
Eyebrows: Original

This uses Vicn's resource. He made dialogues and hair.
Thanks to Vicn.


[b][color=#ffd966][size=3]Requirement[/size][/color][/b]
Skyrim 1.9
SKSE 1.7+
Fuz Ro Do-h - Silent Voice


[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*]SKSE and Fuz Ro Do-h - Silent Voice
[*]Copy contents of the package to your skyrim directory.
[*]Need to save and then reload this data.

[/list]
[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Unstallation[/b][/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*]Type StopQuest zzzDialogueAdoringFan in console.
[*]Saves the game.
[*]Uninstall in your mod manager.

[/list]

[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Voice[/b][/size][/color]
Not included. You convert your own files.
Or copy xwmsample folder of [url=http://www.4shared.com/archive/HrvB4LQH/TamanegiVoice.html]onion voice collection[/url] to DataSoundVoiceAdoringFan.espzOnionVoice.


[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Extra[/b][/size][/color]
Adds a unisex hair for player.


[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Permission[/b][/size][/color]
Feel free to use this mod.
[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/color][color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Credit[/b][/size][/color]
Vicn - Create hair and dialogues.
author: tktk
